entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
